subject: Re: cease-and-desist notice from Radio Shack???
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
If it is in fact a cease-and-desist notice from Radio Shack, it 
wouldn't be the first time they (RS) have done this.  I receieved a 
cease-and-desist notice from Radio Shack many years ago when I was 
modifying their radio scanner products and posting them on the web.  
Guess what... if you go to scanshack.com you can still see step-by-
step instructions on how I modified their scanners, with detailed 
drawings I did.
They (RS/Tandy at that time) lost that battle with me, or I should 
say their lawyer lost that battle with me.
But, as you said... we shall wait and see what is up with this issue.
- Mike
